title.narrative: Sustainable Cities Management Initiative for Senegal

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to improve capacity to plan and implement sustainable city management practices, including climate resilience, in selected urban areas. The project features two components: One related to improving urban governance and better managing floods in Dakar and Saint-Louis (implemented by World Bank Senegal); the second component aims at improving livability in the new DIamniadio city with interventions for greening the production in the industrial park, integrating RE and EE systems in the energy supply mix, and for sustainably managing industrial waste. The project is undertaken within the GEF 6 IAP Sustainable cities Management Initiative for Senegal. Pilot interventions in Dakar and Saint-Louis should serve as a model to be replicated by other cities in Senegal, and beyond.
